meeting_info.location: Dallas City Hall, 6ES Council Briefing Room and Videoconference

agenda_items.title: Call to Order & Pledge of Allegiance
Public Comments on Items III – VI
Vote to Approve the February 8th, 2024, Meeting Minutes
Discussion on Veteran Needs Assessment
agenda_items.description: WCIA Officer Christina da Silva will present to the commissioners on a new initiative, the City of Dallas’ Veteran Needs Assessment. Afterwards, she will answer questions.

agenda_items.title: Discussion on the creation of a Human Rights Commission
agenda_items.description: WCIA Officer Christina da Silva, Human Rights Officer Christopher Graves, and ADA Compliance Manager Gary Copeland will present to the commissioners on the Human Rights Commission. Afterwards, they will answer questions.
agenda_items.presenter: Christina da Silva, Christopher Graves, Gary Copeland

agenda_items.title: Discussion on Increasing Awareness of Veteran Serving Organizations
agenda_items.description: WCIA Officer Christina da Silva will present to the commissioners on two new projects to increase awareness of veteran serving organizations, followed up with a discussion with the commissioners.

agenda_items.title: Announcements
agenda_items.description: The April 11 meeting will have to be cancelled due to the following reasons: 1. The City of Dallas is co-hosting the Welcoming America Conference. All the WCIA staff will be fully engaged with the conference from April 10-12. 2. City Hall does not have another available time for the VAC to reschedule.
